## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>EMB1989, NRPB2, RPB2</u>
- **Gene Name:** EMBRYO DEFECTIVE 1989
- **Description:**   DNA-directed RNA polymerase family protein;(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
